div.div:
Distribution of D
est values among population comparisons.
div.p:
Comparisons within NW, SW, SE migratory orientations are shown as open bars and comparisons among NW, SW, SE migratory orientations are shown as shaded bars. Within SW orientations, D est comparisons did not differ from comparisons within SE orientations (Wilcoxon test P > 0.05). NW vs. SW comparisons were found to have significantly higher D
est values than SW vs. SE comparisons (Wilcoxon test P = 0.013). Remaining comparisons among groups were non-significant ( P > 0.05). Width of bar is proportional to sample size.
